description: Whittier Education Campus is a friendly neighborhood school located in a culturally rich community. Our vision is to prepare all Whittier students to become life-long, innovative learners and productive competitors in the 21st century. Our mission is to provide an interactive, hands-on approach to inquiry and project-based learning focused on science, technology, engineering and mathematics. Whittier's school plan emphasizes development of reading comprehension skills, effective writing skills and a strong mathematics approach. Whittier also offers an engaging athletic program and a fully functioning computer lab for students to enjoy.
